name: Steam Deck
description: PC2 is finally here and it's portable! Imagine your Nintendo Switch with a Library of games you already own, mod support and it's 8K capable

name: The Telephone
description: The future is here! A newfangled instument to trasmit speech of long distances is known as the telephone is here but not to stay.

name: LimeScoots
description: What's better than a world of scooters? A new generation thriled with the rideshare scooter service LimeScoots has left drunken college students bruised and cooler than ever
